title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Inogen Inc

content.text: Inogen Inc goes public and lists its shares on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the ticker symbol INGN.
Inogen announces a 2-for-1 stock split, effectively doubling the number of outstanding shares. The split takes effect on December 22, 2014.
Inogen announces another 2-for-1 stock split. The split will be executed on August 16, 2016.
Inogen announces a follow-on offering of 3,794,904 shares of common stock. The offering is completed on May 12, 2017.
Inogen completes the follow-on offering of 3,794,904 shares of common stock.
Inogen announces a 2-for-1 stock split, with the split date set for June 11, 2020.
